modName: Perseids Inns and Taverns - Realistic Room Rental Enhanced - Patch
summary: Fixes Navmesh error and removes identical to master records.
descriptionHtml:
This is done without the authors permission. There are a lot of posts on the mod author\'s mod page about this. However, there has been no response. If the mod author comes back and wants me to remove this and/or fixes the issue I have no problem with removing it.

The original mod is required and can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25029/?

This is a patch for the enhanced version.
Just replace that esp with this esp.

This fixes the issue that BOSS pointed out about the deleted NAVMESH. You should no longer CTD at the Moorside Inn. As a side benefit I also removed the identical master records.
author: Backodabus
